translations: 1. 使陶醉，使沉醉：使某人感到极度愉悦或兴奋。
· The beauty of the scenery intoxicates me.
2. 使醉：使某人因饮酒过量而处于失去理智的状态。
· Too much alcohol intoxicates a person.

sentences.sentence: The dream excites, even intoxicates us.
sentences.translation: 这种梦想使我们兴奋甚至陶醉。

sentences.sentence: The prospect of success intoxicates me.
It so intoxicates my mind that people take me to be drunk!
sentences.translation: 头脑变得如此醉人，人们也沉溺于陶醉！
